thread.title: Trump Tweets That Intelligence Briefing on ‘So-Called Russian Hacking’ Was ‘Delayed Until Friday’
thread.title_full: Trump Tweets That Intelligence Briefing on ‘So-Called Russian Hacking’ Was ‘Delayed Until Friday’

author: Justin Baragona
title: Trump Tweets That Intelligence Briefing on ‘So-Called Russian Hacking’ Was ‘Delayed Until Friday’
text:
Trump Tweets That Intelligence Briefing on ‘So-Called Russian Hacking’ Was ‘Delayed Until Friday’ by Justin Baragona | 9:47   
Following his tweet this evening that he would finally hold a long-awaited news conference on January 11th, President-elect Donald Trump also used the social media platform to send out some more info on his schedule. The "Intelligence" briefing on so-called "Russian hacking" was delayed until Friday, perhaps more time needed to build a case. Very strange! 
Trump stated last week, after President Barack Obama imposed sanctions on Russia over allegations they directed hacking to influence the election, that he would meet with the heads of the intelligence agencies to be briefed on the situation. 
Regarding the issue of this being delayed, there are reports that the briefing was always scheduled for Friday. Now: Senior US intelligence official tells NBC News briefing was "always" scheduled for Friday, Trump incorrect, per @KenDilanianNBC https://t.co/hBP1lJln6W 
— Ari Melber (@AriMelber) January 4, 2017 
Trump has long been a skeptic on Russian’s involvement in hacking, saying the CIA’s assessment that the country tried to influence the election to help Trump was “ridiculous.”
